> Welcome to **SQL \& Server**, a collaborative workshop series about using **SQL** and [**SQL Server**](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/sql-server). No experience is required!

This series of workshops were given to the Data \& Analytics Team for the Department of Population Health, but all are welcome to browse.

## Materials

All of the materials for these slides can be located at [this Github repo](https://github.com/psanker/sql-server-workshops) (octocat icon in the top-right corner!).
